issue.title: [R] [Docs] Add S3 to the cmake flags
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12546](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12546). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
S3 was inadvertently left off of the cmake flags (including the full version), add that back on
